Super honoured to receive a silver award for Nature & the Countryside from @CPRESussex for our #naturalfloodmanagment

There is a lot of detail that sits behind the @EnvAgencyNW  flood scheme in #Kendal #DidYouKnow we have submitted documents to satisfy our pre-planning conditions for Phase 1  - these are explained on the @TheFloodHub at https://t.co/EymWqMP6tV https://t.co/xzJQ4F93Sg

#DidYouKnow - the @EnvAgencyNW has removed 10,000 tonnes of gravel from the River Kent thought #Kendal this will ensure better river flows through winter #BePrepared find out more @TheFloodHub website

https://t.co/K68hciZG4B

A dedicated page to provide information on #Bluegreen #Algae locations in Cumbria & Lancashire is now live. Blue-Green Algae is naturally occuring which becomes more likely during the summer months. You can read more online https://t.co/tW2gTDBF1n https://t.co/iUMClia7GC

Great to see leaky dams installed on Crompton Moor #Oldham as part of a partnership project to #slowtheflow create habitat & improve our resilience to climate change
